name: Exolon 3D
description:
This is a recreation of the classic ZX Spectrum game Exolon ( https://spectrumcomputing.co.uk/index.php?cat=96&id=0001686 ) by Raffaele Cecco.  You must make your way to the end of the level by shooting the enemies.

  • See the readme for instructions, though it should be pretty self-explanatory.
  • Currently only the first level is implemented.
  • Let me know if you want a Linux version.  If there's any demand, I'll create one.
  • If you have any problems or find any bugs, please let me know.  Also, any messages of encouragement are much appreciated!
